description:
Kyoko moves on to her next endeavor and tries out for a soda commercial, but so does Kanae!  There, Kyoko meets Kanae`s rival, Erika Koenji who relies more on her family`s money to win roles, than talent.  As Kanae and Kyoko team up, can the LME crew bring Erika down and win over the role?
Source: crunchyroll
